de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.animation

Class AnimationRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.animation.AnimationRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObjectRenderManager.GameObjectRenderer

    public class AnimationRenderer
extends Object
implements GameObjectRenderManager.GameObjectRenderer
    Renders an animation for a GameObject onto the screen for the position where the game object is currently positioned in world coordinates.

    This implementation does not directly require an Animation object. Instead, on initialisation it expects a AnimationConfig object which can be constructed via the AnimationConfig.AnimationConfigBuilder implementation. Animations are dynamically created based on the information provided by the configuration.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
